title: MCROBIES GULLY HUTS
paragraphs: McConnell assessed this hut as having High Medium-High Local Significance, Some State Significance individually and as part of the suite and Some National Significance
The Huts of kunanyi/Mount Wellington - Maria Grist
This lush gully was a popular route between town and the Myrtle Gully Track. The Hodgman map shows that there are hut sites in McRobies Gully.
ENSHRINE has located building ruins, but no photographs that can be linked to them. The names (if any), their owners, their purposeâ€”all of this is at present unknown and perplexing.
The Huts of kunanyi/Mount Wellington - Grist
